question: Moussa Traore, who has recently passed away, was the former President of which country?
explanation:
The former President of West African nation Mali, Moussa Traore, has recently passed away at the age of 83.
The veteran leader had ruled the African country for more than 22 years. Eight years after Mali gained independence from France, Traore entered into power in a military rebellion, succeeding the countryâ€™s first president, Modibo Keita.
